experiments.title: invert_simulated
experiments.description: Reproduces the RMSE table of simulated experiments in v3 of the paper.

experiments.title: invert_mc451
experiments.description: Inverts dataset MC-451 using its own characterization.

experiments.title: invert_mc651
experiments.description: Inverts dataset MC-651 using the characterization of dataset MC-451.

experiments.title: idct_opd_min_comparison_michelson
experiments.description: Compares between opd_0=0 and opd_0=opd_min, using Michelson interferometer.

experiments.title: idct_reflectance_invariance_comparison_fp_2
experiments.description: Compares between constant and variant reflectance, using FP 2-wave interferometer.

experiments.title: idct_reflectance_levels_comparison_fp_0
experiments.description: Compares between low, medium, high, and variable reflectance, using FP infty-wave interferometer.

experiments.title: idct_reflectance_levels_comparison_fp_0
experiments.description: Compares between low, medium, high, and variable reflectance, using FP infty-wave interferometer.

experiments.title: idct_mc451
experiments.description: Applies IDCT to the real monochromatic dataset MC-451, using its characterization.
